Interface AIBoardAdapter

All Known Implementing Classes:
BoardAdapter
public interface AIBoardAdapter
Interface for board access by AI agents. Decouples AI agents from concrete Board implementations, allowing agents to work with any board that satisfies this interface.
Author:
Team 04

  • Method Details

    • getCell

      Color getCell(int row, int col)
      Gets the color of a cell on the board.
      Parameters:
      row - The row coordinate
      col - The column coordinate
      Returns:
      The color of the cell (RED, BLACK, or EMPTY)

    • getSize

      int getSize()
      Gets the size of the board.
      Returns:
      The board dimension

    • inBounds

      boolean inBounds(int row, int col)
      Checks if the given coordinates are within board bounds.
      Parameters:
      row - The row coordinate
      col - The column coordinate
      Returns:
      true if coordinates are valid, false otherwise

    • isEmpty

      boolean isEmpty(int row, int col)
      Checks if a cell is empty.
      Parameters:
      row - The row coordinate
      col - The column coordinate
      Returns:
      true if the cell is empty, false otherwise

    • legalMoves

      List<int[]> legalMoves()
      Gets all legal moves for the board state.
      Returns:
      A list of legal moves as [row, col] pairs

    • isTerminal

      boolean isTerminal()
      Checks if the game is over.
      Returns:
      true if a player has won, false otherwise

    • redWins

      boolean redWins()
      Checks if RED player has won.
      Returns:
      true if RED has connected top to bottom, false otherwise

    • blackWins

      boolean blackWins()
      Checks if BLACK player has won.
      Returns:
      true if BLACK has connected left to right, false otherwise

    • copy

      AIBoardAdapter copy()
      Creates a copy of the current board state. Used for simulations and lookahead calculations.
      Returns:
      A new board with the same state

    • makeMove

      boolean makeMove(int row, int col, Player player)
      Makes a move on the board.
      Parameters:
      row - The row coordinate
      col - The column coordinate
      player - The player making the move
      Returns:
      true if the move was legal and executed, false otherwise

    • getMoveRed

      void getMoveRed(int row, int col, Color color)
      Places a RED stone at the given position. Used by GameState for move simulation.
      Parameters:
      row - The row coordinate
      col - The column coordinate
      color - The color

    • getMoveBlack

      void getMoveBlack(int row, int col, Color color)
      Places a BLACK stone at the given position. Used by GameState for move simulation.
      Parameters:
      row - The row coordinate
      col - The column coordinate
      color - The color

    • neighbors

      List<int[]> neighbors(int row, int col)
      Gets the neighboring cells for the given position. Used by heuristics to evaluate move scores.
      Parameters:
      row - The row coordinate
      col - The column coordinate
      Returns:
      A list of neighboring [row, col] pairs
